did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Registrar records,
1984-1986

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Registrar

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Records from the Registrar of the College of Veterinary Medicine, Cornell University.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Veterinary College Registrar's Office is the repository for all academic records for DVM students. The office assists DVM students to understand and complete the requirements for graduation.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of the Registrar of the College of Veterinary Medicine, Cornell University.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University -- College of Veterinary Medicine -- Registrar.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Registrar records, #24-16-3330. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: SERIES LIST
arrangement.p: A collection of reports and correspondence relating to the curriculum review which took place in the mid 1980s. Included are reports of the Task Force to Review the Curriculum and the Committee to Review Examinations and Educational Process. The material was originally housed in one binder.

did.unittitle: Task Force on the Curriculum Reports
